content.rendered:
It’s no secret that these days you can get your hands on a fairly decent smartphone without completely emptying your savings account. The standard of budget handsets has dramatically improved in recent years, with some of the most innovative smartphone technology now available in phones that can cost you a minimal amount per month with no upfront cost and still give you access to some fantastic free perks.

At Fonehouse we pride ourselves on providing our loyal customers with our lowest prices ever, and we don’t just mean on your iPhones and Samsungs. We are constantly searching for the best deals across all smartphones, including budget handsets.

Read on to discover some of our favourite budget handsets and the best offers across each one.

Huawei P Smart

The Huawei P Smart was released earlier this year to rave reviews. Critics immediately hailed it as possibly one of the best budget smartphones of 2018.

The Huawei P Smart combines a 5.65 inch screen, a 1080×2160 high resolution display and top of the range specifications such as a responsive fingerprint scanner to truly set it apart as a budget handset that performs as well as some of the most advanced phones currently on the market. When you add to that dual rear cameras, and innovative hand-gesture technology to allow ‘hands free selfies’, you are guaranteed impressive camera capabilities that will enable you to take stunning shots that will take your photography to the next level.

At Fonehouse you can currently get your hands on the Huawei P Smart with no upfront cost, for just £23 per month over 24 months. This deal gives you unlimited texts and minutes, 4GB of data and a fantastic £40 cashback on a Vodafone Red Extra plan.

Nokia 5

Nokia have truly restored their customers faith in them in recent years by manufacturing a series of smartphones that look great and perform well, but don’t cost the earth.

At Fonehouse we’re big fans of the Nokia 5 as an affordable and reliable smartphone. Running on a Qualcomm Snapdragon 430 processor with Android Nougat means that you can run all of your favourite apps from the Google Play Store smoothly and quickly. 16GB of internal storage, expandable to 128GB, gives users the reassurance that they won’t have to pick and choose between storing apps, photos and files.

A 13MP rear camera, and an 8MP front camera make for a camera setup that rival some of the best handsets around, making for a budget smartphone that truly is worth every penny.

You can get your hands on a great Nokia 5 deal at Fonehouse, for just £28 per month over 24 months, with unlimited texts and minutes and nothing to pay upfront. On this EE Essential plan users can take advantage of 4GB of data, an amazing £160 cashback and access to great free perks such as free BT Sport.

Sony Xperia XA2

The Sony Xperia XA2 is a great value smartphone that stays faithful to Sony\’s trusted design. The 5.2 inch display comes equipped with  Corning Gorilla Glass, offering both stunning clarity and reinforced durability.

For such an affordable handset, the XA2 comes with impressively good specs. A mighty 23MP camera is one of the most powerful you’ll see in a handset within this price range, featuring Exmor RS for mobile sensor and 4K video recording with outstanding clarity and sharpness in any lighting conditions. An 8MP front facing camera means that you can be sure that your selfies will of a fantastic quality at all times.

If you’re looking to grab a great value budget handset, at Fonehouse we’ve got some of the best Sony Xperia XA2 deals you’ll be able to find. For just £28 per month on EE Essential you can take advantage of unlimited texts and minutes, 4GB of data and still receive £70 cashback!

LG K10

LG have been making great value smartphones for years, and the the latest, upgraded LG K10 is no exception. The LG K10 is a beautifully compact handset featuring elegant curves and a brushed finish backing complemented by 2.5D glass for added durability. With a 5.3inch HD display, a 13MP rear camera, a 1.5 GHz MediaTek octa-core processor plus bags of expandable storage, this is a handset that won’t let you down.

We’re thrilled to be able to offer the impressive LG K10 for just £30 per month with no upfront cost. On this great value Vodafone Red Extra plan you get unlimited texts and minutes, a whopping 16GB of data and £140 cashback, making for an LG K10 deal that you really can\’t beat.
